description: This file is a React component named ProjectsPage that provides a user interface for managing a list of projects, including creating, editing, deleting, and filtering projects. It handles form state, API interactions, and UI rendering.

methods.name: loadAll
methods.description: Fetches the list of projects and skills from the API and updates state.

methods.name: startCreate
methods.description: Resets the form to create a new project.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Populates the form with selected project data for editing.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission for creating or updating a project.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a specified project after user confirmation.

methods.name: toggleSkill
methods.description: Adds or removes a skill ID from the project's skills list.
